reactions.description: This can be whatever you want
reactions.type: This can be 'react', 'reply', 'react-reply', 'reply-react'. React will react to the message with an emoji from reaction[], and reply will reply to the message with some text and/or file/image. 'react-reply' or 'reply-react' will do both
reaction: Use backslash before the emoji in discord to get the appropriate emoji code to put here

reply.file: The path to the file (starting from app's root dir)

reactions.regex: A RegularExpression formatted as a string.
